Judul: CULTURE AND POWER: INTERCULTURALITY AS A COMBINED POLITICAL, ETHICAL AND THEORETICAL PROJECT
Abstrak: An interview with Cultural Studies professor Daniel Mato is presented. He discusses the institutionalization of Cultural Studies ("Estudios Culturales") in Latin American universities. Asked about the use of the English language in Cultural Studies, he claims that written language and academic discourse must themselves be assessed as hidden forms of power. He also contends that knowledge is also particular to a certain place rather than universal.
Sumber: Cultural Studies Vol. 26, No. 1 January 2012, pp. 126  140
